title: Saul Tries to Kill David
summary: Saul’s attempts to kill David intensify. Jonathan and Michal (Saul’s daughter and David’s wife) help David escape. David flees to Samuel, and God protects him by causing Saul’s men—and even Saul himself—to prophesy.

faq.question: Who helped David escape from Saul?
faq.answer: Jonathan warned him, and Michal helped him flee through a window.

faq.question: What happened when Saul pursued David to Samuel?
faq.answer: The Spirit of God came on Saul, and he began to prophesy, preventing him from harming David.
